price: 7. Tout comme vous, ils pensaient qu’Allah n’enverrait nul (Messager)[582].
arabic: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا
footnotes: [582] Autre interprétation : « Eux aussi pensaient comme vous qu’Allah ne ressusciterait personne. »

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahum ẓannū kamā ẓanantum an lan yabʿatha al-lahu aḥadan
